name: DeepLinq A.I Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a technology infrastructure company designed to offer white-labeled embedded finance to its customers. The company's B2B (business-to-business) platforms and marketplaces seamlessly assimilate data digitally into the client's self-help application to help and understand their customers' businesses better and create unique credit scores for each of their borrowers, thereby enabling SMEs (Small and Medium Enterprises) to have hassle-free and fair access to capital and business growth.
one_liner: Developer of a technology infrastructure company designed to offer white-labeled embedded finance to its customers. The company's B2B (business-to-business) platforms and marketplaces seamlessly assimilate data digitally into the client's self-help application to help and understand their customers' businesses better and create unique credit scores for each of their borrowers, thereby enabling SMEs (Small and Medium Enterprises) to have hassle-free and fair access to capital and business growth.
